title: Bhili Akra (1854) Bible Portions and Stories
title_vernacular: Bhili Akra (1854) Pavitra Granthana Ane Varta
description: Bhili Akra translation of certain Bible passages by Dr. Barth for the German and Foreign School-Book-Society in 1854. The Bhili languages are a Western Indo-Aryan language group spoken in west-central India.
provider: German and Foreign School Book Society

language.name: Bhili
language.area: Madhya Pradesh, Jhabua, Dhar, Ratlam, Indore, Khargone districts; Gujarat, Sabarkantha, Panchmahals, and Dahod districts.
